title: Behind the Idea #58: Davita's Moat And Pricing With Michael Knipp
description: Healthcare is difficult as an industry unto itself, as a political issue, and as an area to invest in. We revisit Davita Healthcare by speaking with a bull who argued that we were missing pieces from the puzzle last time we covered the story. And as we discuss, it becomes clear that the messiness around healthcare may be with us for a while, and one way or another it may create opportunities for anybody who can understand it fully.
itunes:title: Davita's Moat And Pricing With Michael Knipp
itunes:author: Seeking Alpha
itunes:subtitle: We speak with a Seeking Alpha reader and DVA bull to hear what the short case is missing.
